## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G28210](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G28210)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PMZ, SAP12</u>
- **Gene Name:** STRESS-ASSOCIATED PROTEIN 12
- **Description:**   zinc finger (AN1-like) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
